books.author: by Stephanie Winston Wolkoff
books.description: The former director of special events at Vogue describes parting ways with the First Lady after being made the scapegoat for inauguration finance irregularities.
books.name: MELANIA AND ME

books.author: by Isabel Wilkerson
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist examines aspects of caste systems across civilizations and reveals a rigid hierarchy in America today.
books.name: CASTE

books.author: by Michael S. Schmidt
books.description: The New York Times Washington correspondent details actions by officials who attempted to contain the president.
books.name: DONALD TRUMP V. THE UNITED STATES

books.author: by Glennon Doyle
books.description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice.
books.name: UNTAMED

books.author: by Mary L. Trump
books.description: The clinical psychologist gives her assessment of events and patterns inside her family and how they shaped President Trump.
books.name: TOO MUCH AND NEVER ENOUGH

books.author: by Ibram X. Kendi
books.description: A primer for creating a more just and equitable society through identifying and opposing racism.
books.name: HOW TO BE AN ANTIRACIST

books.author: by Robin DiAngelo
books.description: Historical and cultural analyses on what causes defensive moves by white people and how this inhibits cross-racial dialogue.
books.name: WHITE FRAGILITY

books.author: by Sean Hannity
books.description: The Fox News host offers his assessment on what is at stake in the 2020 election.
books.name: LIVE FREE OR DIE

books.author: by Ian W. Toll
books.description: The third book in the Pacific War trilogy describes the last year of World War II in the Pacific.
books.name: TWILIGHT OF THE GODS

books.author: by Jon Meacham
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning biographer creates a portrait of Representative John Lewis, the late civil rights leader and congressman for Georgia’s Fifth Congressional District.
books.name: HIS TRUTH IS MARCHING ON

books.author: by Brian Stelter
books.description: The CNN anchor and chief media correspondent examines the inner workings of Fox News and its relationship with President Trump.
books.name: HOAX

books.author: by Jeff Benedict
books.description: The history of the New England Patriots from N.F.L. laughingstock to making 10 trips to the Super Bowl.
books.name: THE DYNASTY

books.author: by Chasten Buttigieg
books.description: The educator and advocate describes growing up gay in a small Midwestern town and meeting his husband, Pete.
books.name: I HAVE SOMETHING TO TELL YOU

books.author: by Bryan Stevenson
books.description: A law professor and MacArthur grant recipient’s memoir of his decades of work to free innocent people condemned to death.
books.name: JUST MERCY

books.author: by Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up biracial in apartheid South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show.”
books.name: BORN A CRIME
